ul.li: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

div.p: Apple is hiring outstanding software engineers to deliver the next generation of routing services for Apple Maps. If you are passionate about building the world's best routing platform at massive scale, this opportunity is for you. You will develop cutting-edge routing algorithms to constantly improve the routing experience and help millions of people every day with their driving, walking and public transit.

ul.li: Industry experience in C++ and Linux
Outstanding understanding of graph algorithms and data structures
Excellent problem solving and analytical skills

div.p:
Apple Maps provides driving, walking, and public transit routes to millions of users every day. As part of the routing team, your responsibilities will include:
Designing routing features that will be used by millions worldwide Improve routing calculations using your algorithm knowledge Implementing new features and resolving complex issues Working on high performance code using C++ Participating in design and code reviews Working with other engineers and QA to deliver high quality routes to our customers Influencing the future product direction
MS or PhD in computer science or a related field, or equivalent experience

For this role, the following skills would be a plus, but are not necessary.
Data Science or Machine Learning background Maps or GIS experience
